original_title: There's a Mobster Under My Bed!
overview: Wherever has he come from? Who is he hiding from? And what on earth will she do with him?!  With a literal Mobster layin' low under her bed - it's up to our 8-year-old girl to figure out what exactly he's doing there - and how to get rid of him.
tagline: A young girl encounters a notorious mobster under her bed.
title: There's a Mobster Under My Bed!
